text: Miroslav Mironov (; 28 November 1963 – 7 March 2014) was a Bulgarian footballer and coach.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:FC Dunav Ruse players Category:PFC Slavia Sofia players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:Association football forwards Category:Bulgarian football managers Category:PFC Slavia Sofia managers
